hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.raster

Interface BWRaster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BWRasterMem

    public interface BWRaster
    Black-and-White raster. This is an abstraction for all raster devices of fixed width and height for which each pixel can be painted with only two colors: black (when pixel is turned off) and white (when pixel is turned on).
    Author:
    Dan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Turns off all pixels in this raster.
      void disableFlipMode()
      Disables flip mode.
      void enableFlipMode()
      Enables flip mode.
      int getHeight() 
      int getWidth() 
      boolean isTurnedOn(int x, int y)
      Checks if specified pixel is turned on.
      void turnOff(int x, int y)
      Turns off specified pixel.
      void turnOn(int x, int y)
      Turns on specified pixel unless flip mode is enabled, in which case pixel state is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns:
        width of this raster

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns:
        height of this raster

      • clear

        void clear()
        Turns off all pixels in this raster.

      • turnOn

        void turnOn(int x,
            int y)
        Turns on specified pixel unless flip mode is enabled, in which case pixel state is changed. In other words, if it was turned on it will be turned off and if it was turned off it will be turned on.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given coordinates are not valid for this raster

      • turnOff

        void turnOff(int x,
             int y)
        Turns off specified pixel.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given coordinates are not valid for this raster

      • enableFlipMode

        void enableFlipMode()
        Enables flip mode. When turned on, method turnOn(int, int) flips the state of the pixel.

      • disableFlipMode

        void disableFlipMode()
        Disables flip mode.

      • isTurnedOn

        boolean isTurnedOn(int x,
                   int y)
        Checks if specified pixel is turned on.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        true is specified pixel is turned on; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given coordinates are not valid for this raster
